original_title: „Sprechen Sie Deutsch?“ – auf Spurensuche im Land der Erinnerung
overview: What do the long-ago war experiences of one's parents have to do with one's own life? Oliver Kanehl takes the audience on a search for the places of his father's wartime childhood in present-day Poland. Past and present meet when today's normality encounters past horrors and hidden trauma is slowly revealed.
title: „Sprechen Sie Deutsch?“ – auf Spurensuche im Land der Erinnerung
